title: ‘Junk science alert’: MSNBC contributor shares why she thinks Mike Pence is lying
text:
MSNBC contributor Joyce Alene, a former prosecutor, shared why she thinks Mike Pence is lying. Hint: It’s kind of like spidey-sense, but for mere mortals:

As a prosecutor, I was taught that when a witness looks down & to the right as they answer, it’s a signal they are not being truthful. https://t.co/itbKOztvET — Joyce Alene (@JoyceWhiteVance) October 27, 2019

Hey, it works on children!

Yes. Prosecutorial training made it tough on my kids during the teenage years. Favorite overheard older brother to younger brother comment: “why would you try to lie to a woman who puts people in jail for a living?” — Joyce Alene (@JoyceWhiteVance) October 27, 2019

Did she look down and to the right when she typed this tweet, because she’s getting called out:

I was a prosecutor and no one I ever worked with, ( SDNY and Calif) ever said this or believed it I saw a lot of liars in my 37+yr career and this is just hogwash #Liars — Kim Seefeld (@KAS_SB) October 27, 2019

But we’re unimpressed:

Junk science alert https://t.co/yYv59rSN4X — Robby Soave (@robbysoave) October 27, 2019

Enjoy the mockery MSNBC lady:

I've heard that if you dunk the suspect in a deep well of water, and they drown, it means they're

not a witch. I hope somebody gave this prosecutor's cases a good look. https://t.co/pvKA9Iwo2q — Gabriel Malor (@gabrielmalor) October 27, 2019

As a warlock, I was taught that when a child coughs, it means his soul is trying to escape and will be easy to capture https://t.co/cTNxfBV3Xl — Jesse Singal (@jessesingal) October 27, 2019

Did you really just say that publicly? I also heard that if they tug their left ear, the defense attorney will steal second base https://t.co/Dp4ZLctj7w — Jim Hanson (@JimHansonDC) October 27, 2019

As a prosecutor, I was taught that when a witness was born under a rising moon and Venus is in the twelfth house, it’s a signal they are not being truthful. https://t.co/u0oP1S5EGf — BAGEL (Jewish muffin) (@RafiLetzter) October 27, 2019

She also employs phrenologists to testify as experts in criminal trials. https://t.co/eXIoOdnfWP — Mo Mo (@molratty) October 27, 2019

do Resistance with Cop Mindset Psychology Hacks, now available as a 3 DVD set for $89.95 https://t.co/qd2XRGedc2 — Patrick Blanchfield (@PatBlanchfield) October 27, 2019

And this is why you should never speak to the police without a lawyer present:

The sort of pseudo-science I'd expect from the worst of TIX training, not from a former (8-year) US Attorney. Good reminder on the dangers of speaking to police or prosecutors w/o a lawyer.https://t.co/QQajwK9NF5 — KC Johnson (@kcjohnson9) October 27, 2019
